title: Bare Land for sale in prime location near St. John's College
details:
Bare Land for sale in a residential and quiet area on Columbuthurai Road between Chundikuli Girls' College and St. Ann's Church. There is a line for electricity. Prime desirable location down the road from prestigious St. John's College.
Address: 141 Columbuthurai Road, Chundikuli, Jaffna
Property Type: Bare Land
Area of land: 30 perches
Rs. 400,000 Per Perch
Rs. 6.5 million for all three lachchams
Provide me with your email and phone and I will contact you so you can see my attorney in Jaffna.
